verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Also thou son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> unto the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> and say הָרֵי֙ <S%H2022><s%> Ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> hath said הָאוֹיֵ֛ב <S%H341><s%> Because the enemy עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> against הֶאָ֑ח <S%H1889><s%> against you Aha וּבָמ֣וֹת <S%H1116><s%> high places עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> even the ancient לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <S%H4181><s%> are ours in possession הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> have become לָּֽנוּ׃

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> Therefore prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> and say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> reason בְּיַ֡עַן <S%H3282><s%> reason שַׁמּוֹת֩ <S%H8074><s%> Because they have made [you] desolate וְשָׁאֹ֨ף <S%H7602><s%> and swallowed you up אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> מִסָּבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> on every side לִֽהְיוֹתְכֶ֤ם <S%H1961><s%> become מֽוֹרָשָׁה֙ <S%H4181><s%> that ye might be a possession לִשְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> unto the residue הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen וַתֵּֽעֲל֛וּ <S%H5927><s%> and ye are taken up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> in the lips לָשׁ֖וֹן <S%H3956><s%> of talkers וְדִבַּת־ <S%H1681><s%> and [are] an infamy עָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> Therefore ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְ֠הוִה <S%H3068><s%> GOD לֶהָרִ֨ים <S%H2022><s%> to the mountains וְלַגְּבָע֜וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֣ים <S%H650><s%> to the rivers וְלַגֵּאָי֗וֹת <S%H1516><s%> and to the valleys וְלֶחֳרָב֤וֹת <S%H2723><s%> wastes הַשֹּֽׁמְמוֹת֙ <S%H8076><s%> desolate וְלֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> and to the cities הַנֶּעֱזָב֔וֹת <S%H5800><s%> that are forsaken אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> have become לְבַז֙ <S%H957><s%> which became a prey וּלְלַ֔עַג <S%H3933><s%> and derision לִשְׁאֵרִ֥ית <S%H7611><s%> to the residue הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> that [are] round about ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3068><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֠א <S%H3808><s%> not בְּאֵ֨שׁ <S%H784><s%> Surely in the fire קִנְאָתִ֥י <S%H7068><s%> of my jealousy דִבַּ֛רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> have I spoken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <S%H7611><s%> against the residue הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against אֱד֣וֹם <S%H123><s%> and against all Idumea כֻּלָּ֑א <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who נָתְנֽוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> which have appointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצִ֣י ׀ <S%H776><s%> my land לָ֠הֶם <S%H1992><s%> as לְמ֨וֹרָשָׁ֜ה <S%H4181><s%> into their possession בְּשִׂמְחַ֤ת <S%H8057><s%> with the joy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לֵבָב֙ <S%H3824><s%> of all [their] heart בִּשְׁאָ֣ט <S%H7589><s%> with despiteful נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> minds לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of מִגְרָשָׁ֖הּ <S%H4054><s%> to cast it out לָבַֽז׃ <S%H957><s%> for a prey

לָכֵ֕ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> Prophesy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning אַדְמַ֣ת <S%H127><s%> therefore concerning the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <S%H559><s%> and say לֶהָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> unto the mountains וְ֠לַגְּבָעוֹת <S%H1389><s%> and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֨ים <S%H650><s%> to the rivers וְלַגֵּאָי֜וֹת <S%H1516><s%> and to the valleys כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold בְקִנְאָתִ֤י <S%H7068><s%> in my jealousy וּבַחֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> and in my fury דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> Behold I have spoken יַ֛עַן <S%H3282><s%> because כְּלִמַּ֥ת <S%H3639><s%> the shame גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen נְשָׂאתֶֽם׃ <S%H5375><s%> because ye have borne

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I נָשָׂ֣אתִי <S%H5375><s%> I have lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> Surely the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לָכֶ֣ם מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> that [are] about הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> will themselves כְּלִמָּתָ֥ם <S%H3639><s%> their shame יִשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <S%H5375><s%> you they shall bear

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> O הָרֵ֤י <S%H2022><s%> But ye O mountains יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַנְפְּכֶ֣ם <S%H6057><s%> your branches תִּתֵּ֔נוּ <S%H5414><s%> ye shall shoot forth וּפֶרְיְכֶ֥ם <S%H6529><s%> your fruit תִּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> and yield לְעַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> to my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קֵרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> for they are at hand לָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> to come

כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about וּפָנִ֣יתִי <S%H6437><s%> For behold I [am] for you and I will turn אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to you וְנֶעֱבַדְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5647><s%> unto you and ye shall be tilled וְנִזְרַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H2232><s%> and sown

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֤י <S%H7235><s%> And I will multiply עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> men כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> upon you all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֻּלֹּ֑ה <S%H3605><s%> all וְנֹֽשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> shall be inhabited הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> [even] all of it and the cities וְהֶחֳרָב֖וֹת <S%H2723><s%> and the wastes תִּבָּנֶֽינָה׃ <S%H1129><s%> shall be builded

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֧י <S%H7235><s%> And I will multiply עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> on אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> upon you man וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> and beast וְרָב֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> and they shall increase וּפָר֑וּ <S%H6509><s%> and bring fruit וְהוֹשַׁבְתִּ֨י <S%H3427><s%> and I will settle אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> כְּקַדְמֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H6927><s%> you after your old estates וְהֵטִֽבֹתִי֙ <S%H2895><s%> and will do better מֵרִאשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H7221><s%> [unto you] than at your beginnings וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

וְהוֹלַכְתִּי֩ <S%H1980><s%> along עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H5921><s%> and אָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> Yea I will cause men אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֤י <S%H5971><s%> upon you [even] my people יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel וִֽירֵשׁ֔וּךָ <S%H3423><s%> and they shall possess וְהָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> you will become לָהֶ֖ם לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> thee and thou shalt be their inheritance וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תוֹסִ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> and thou shalt no more ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again לְשַׁכְּלָֽם׃ <S%H7921><s%> henceforth bereave ס

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because אֹמְרִ֣ים <S%H559><s%> Because they say לָכֶ֔ם אֹכֶ֥לֶת <S%H398><s%> unto you Thou [land] devourest up אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> men [אָתִּי כ] (אָ֑תְּ <S%H859><s%> you ק) וּמְשַׁכֶּ֥לֶת <S%H7921><s%> and hast bereaved [גֹּויֵךְ כ] (גֹּויַ֖יִךְ <S%H1471><s%> Gentile ק) הָיִֽית׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> men לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no תֹ֣אכְלִי <S%H398><s%> Therefore thou shalt devour ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer [וְגֹויֵךְ כ] (וְגֹויַ֖יִךְ <S%H1471><s%> Gentile ק) לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and no [תְכַשְּׁלִי־ כ] (תְשַׁכְּלִי־ <S%H3782><s%> bereave ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer ק) נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> any more saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אַשְׁמִ֨יעַ <S%H8085><s%> Neither will I cause [men] to hear אֵלַ֤יִךְ <S%H413><s%> about עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> anymore כְּלִמַּ֣ת <S%H3639><s%> in thee the shame הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> the reproach עַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִשְׂאִי־ <S%H5375><s%> any more neither shalt thou bear ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> any [וְגֹויֵךְ כ] (וְגֹויַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1471><s%> the nations ק) לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַכְשִׁ֣לִי <S%H3782><s%> to fall ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> any more saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD ס
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> when the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> dwelt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> their own אַדְמָתָ֔ם <S%H127><s%> in their own land וַיְטַמְּא֣וּ <S%H2930><s%> they defiled אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> בְּדַרְכָּ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> it by their own way וּבַעֲלִֽילוֹתָ֑ם <S%H5949><s%> and by their doings כְּטֻמְאַת֙ <S%H2932><s%> me as the uncleanness הַנִּדָּ֔ה <S%H5079><s%> of a removed woman הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become דַרְכָּ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> their way לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> was before

וָאֶשְׁפֹּ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> Wherefore I poured חֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַדָּ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> upon them for the blood אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁפְכ֣וּ <S%H8210><s%> that they had shed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land וּבְגִלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1544><s%> and for their idols טִמְּאֽוּהָ׃ <S%H2930><s%> [wherewith] they had polluted

וָאָפִ֤יץ <S%H6327><s%> And I scattered אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> them among the heathen וַיִּזָּר֖וּ <S%H2219><s%> and they were dispersed בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> through the countries כְּדַרְכָּ֥ם <S%H1870><s%> according to their way וְכַעֲלִילוֹתָ֖ם <S%H5949><s%> and according to their doings שְׁפַטְתִּֽים׃ <S%H8199><s%> I judged

וַיָּב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> And when they entered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> unto the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> whither they went שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> they וַֽיְחַלְּל֖וּ <S%H2490><s%> they profaned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> my holy בֶּאֱמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> when they said לָהֶם֙ עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> to them These [are] the people יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These וּמֵאַרְצ֖וֹ <S%H776><s%> out of his land יָצָֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> and are gone forth

וָאֶחְמֹ֖ל <S%H2550><s%> But I had pity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> for mine holy אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which חִלְּל֙וּהוּ֙ <S%H2490><s%> had profaned בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> which the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> whither they went שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore say לְבֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> for לְמַעַנְכֶ֛ם <S%H4616><s%> your sake אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am עֹשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> I do בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> not [this] for your sakes O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> name's קָדְשִׁי֙ <S%H6944><s%> but for mine holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חִלַּלְתֶּ֔ם <S%H2490><s%> sake which ye have profaned בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּ֥אתֶם <S%H935><s%> whither ye went שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וְקִדַּשְׁתִּ֞י <S%H6942><s%> And I will sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמִ֣י <S%H8034><s%> name הַגָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> my great הַֽמְחֻלָּל֙ <S%H2490><s%> which was profaned בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חִלַּלְתֶּ֖ם <S%H2490><s%> which ye have profaned בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וְיָדְע֨וּ <S%H3045><s%> shall know הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <S%H1471><s%> of them and the heathen כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD בְּהִקָּדְשִׁ֥י <S%H6942><s%> when I shall be sanctified בָכֶ֖ם לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> in you before their eyes

וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <S%H3947><s%> For I will take אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> you from among הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen וְקִבַּצְתִּ֥י <S%H6908><s%> and gather אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> you out of all countries וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <S%H935><s%> and will bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אַדְמַתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H127><s%> you into your own land

וְזָרַקְתִּ֧י <S%H2236><s%> Then will I sprinkle עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> and מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> water טְהוֹרִ֖ים <S%H2889><s%> clean וּטְהַרְתֶּ֑ם <S%H2891><s%> upon you and ye shall be clean מִכֹּ֧ל <S%H3605><s%> all טֻמְאוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H2932><s%> from all your filthiness וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גִּלּ֥וּלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1544><s%> and from all your idols אֲטַהֵ֥ר <S%H2891><s%> will I cleanse אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> also will I give לָכֶם֙ לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart חָדָ֔שׁ <S%H2319><s%> A new וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit חֲדָשָׁ֖ה <S%H2319><s%> you and a new אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> will I put בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <S%H7130><s%> within וַהֲסִ֨רֹתִ֜י <S%H5493><s%> you and I will take away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> heart הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <S%H68><s%> the stony מִבְּשַׂרְכֶ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> out of your flesh וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> and I will give לָכֶ֖ם לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> you an heart בָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> of flesh

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רוּחִ֖י <S%H7307><s%> my spirit אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> And I will put בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <S%H7130><s%> within וְעָשִׂ֗יתִי <S%H6213><s%> you and cause אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> my בְּחֻקַּי֙ <S%H2706><s%> in my statutes תֵּלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> to walk וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments תִּשְׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> and ye shall keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> and do

וִישַׁבְתֶּ֣ם <S%H3427><s%> And ye shall dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I gave לַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> to your fathers וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <S%H1961><s%> become לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and ye shall be my people וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <S%H595><s%> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> and I will be your God

וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּ֣י <S%H3467><s%> I will also save אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all טֻמְאֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H2932><s%> you from all your uncleannesses וְקָרָ֤אתִי <S%H7121><s%> and I will call אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for הַדָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> for the corn וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֣י <S%H7235><s%> and will increase אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and I will not אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> it and lay עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and רָעָֽב׃ <S%H7458><s%> no famine

וְהִרְבֵּיתִי֙ <S%H7235><s%> And I will multiply אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> the fruit הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> of the tree וּתְנוּבַ֖ת <S%H8570><s%> and the increase הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> so אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> after לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> that ye shall receive ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again חֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> no more reproach רָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> of famine בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen

וּזְכַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H2142><s%> Then shall ye remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H1870><s%> ways הָרָעִ֔ים <S%H7451><s%> your own evil וּמַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4611><s%> and your doings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not טוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> that [were] not good וּנְקֹֽטֹתֶם֙ <S%H6962><s%> and shall lothe בִּפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> yourselves in your own sight עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> for עֲוֹנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5771><s%> for your iniquities וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H8441><s%> and for your abominations

לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> for לְמַעַנְכֶ֣ם <S%H4616><s%> your sake אֲנִֽי־ <S%H589><s%> I am עֹשֶׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> Not for your sakes do נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> I [this] saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יִוָּדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> be it known לָכֶ֑ם בּ֧וֹשׁוּ <S%H954><s%> unto you be ashamed וְהִכָּלְמ֛וּ <S%H3637><s%> and confounded מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> for your own ways בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> In the day טַהֲרִ֣י <S%H2891><s%> that I shall have cleansed אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all עֲוֹנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5771><s%> you from all your iniquities וְהֽוֹשַׁבְתִּי֙ <S%H3427><s%> I will also cause [you] to dwell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> in the cities וְנִבְנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> shall be builded הֶחֳרָבֽוֹת׃ <S%H2723><s%> and the wastes

וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַנְּשַׁמָּ֖ה <S%H8074><s%> And the desolate תֵּֽעָבֵ֑ד <S%H5647><s%> shall be tilled תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> of being שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> whereas it lay desolate לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of everyone עוֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> of all that passed by

וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they shall say הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַלֵּ֙זוּ֙ <S%H1977><s%> This הַנְּשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H8074><s%> that was desolate הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> has become כְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> is become like the garden עֵ֑דֶן <S%H5731><s%> of Eden וְהֶעָרִ֧ים <S%H5892><s%> cities הֶחֳרֵב֛וֹת <S%H2720><s%> and the waste וְהַֽנְשַׁמּ֥וֹת <S%H8074><s%> and desolate וְהַנֶּהֱרָס֖וֹת <S%H2040><s%> and ruined בְּצוּר֥וֹת <S%H1219><s%> [are become] fenced יָשָֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H3427><s%> [and] are inhabited

וְיָדְע֣וּ <S%H3045><s%> you shall know הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> Then the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that יִֽשָּׁאֲרוּ֮ <S%H7604><s%> that are left סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶם֒ <S%H5439><s%> round about כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD בָּנִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1129><s%> build הַנֶּ֣הֱרָס֔וֹת <S%H2040><s%> the ruined נָטַ֖עְתִּי <S%H5193><s%> [places and] plant הַנְּשַׁמָּ֑ה <S%H8074><s%> that that was desolate אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> have spoken וְעָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <S%H6213><s%> [it] and I will do ס

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> also זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אִדָּרֵ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> I will yet [for] this be enquired לְבֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of by the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לָהֶ֑ם אַרְבֶּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> [it] for them I will increase אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> כַּצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> like a flock אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> them with men

כְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> flock קָֽדָשִׁ֗ים <S%H6944><s%> As the holy כְּצֹ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> as the flock יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem בְּמ֣וֹעֲדֶ֔יהָ <S%H4150><s%> in her solemn feasts כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> so תִּהְיֶ֙ינָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become הֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> cities הֶחֳרֵב֔וֹת <S%H2720><s%> so shall the waste מְלֵא֖וֹת <S%H4392><s%> be filled צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> with flocks אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of men וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD ס
